name: Testerize
body:
### Testerize
Testerize lets you figure out the best, most profitable business ideas easily, with no technical background required.

### Already online
Creates a fully functional website for you, that is live on the internet minutes after your million dollar idea comes to you.

### Product Page
Comes stock with beautiful template pages for your product ideas. 

### Track user interest
Testerize tracks which ideas your potential users are most interested in and even segments them by price point.
tagline: Test which potential products would make the best business
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
